title: Web Developer
job_overview:
We're looking for a talented web developer. on-page and technical SEO capability is a big bonus.

Key Responsibilities

- Front-end web development (landing pages, websites)
- Domain and hosting management
- on-page and technical SEO capability

Agency Experience:
• Previous agency experience is highly desirable (but not required), bringing a fast-paced, multi-client mindset to the role.

Soft Skills:
• Excellent communication skills.
• Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team.
• Strong organizational skills with a keen attention to detail.

What We Offer
• Competitive compensation and incentives.
• Opportunity to work in a fast-paced, innovative environment.
• Continuous learning and professional development.
• Collaborative and supportive team culture.


How to Apply

We’d love to hear from you. Please attach your resume, cover letter, and any relevant case studies or portfolio examples when applying.
